T02D3441:100a-1: shr'i man w'a g'i r'a dza s'a dha nam /
T02D3441:100a-3: dpal ldan ngag gi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3441:100a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3441:100a-5: 'gro ba ma lus pa la yang dag bde ba'i mchog 'dod rang gi bde ba ni //
T02D3441:100a-6: chung ngu yang ni 'dod min rang bzhin chen po yang dag bla ma'i bka' yis ni /
T02D3441:100a-7: blo gros dman shing chu la shes rab chu skyes rnam par rgyas byed mkhas pa yis //
T02D3441:100a-8: bcom ldan 'jam pa'i dpal gyi sgrub thabs bdag gis yang dag rab tu bri bar bya //
T02D3441:100a-9: dad pas dge ba'i ma ma yang dag nyer ston cing //
T02D3441:100a-10: gang gis mi dge'i bya ba yang ni yongs spangs shing //
T02D3441:100a-11: de bzhin yid ni dag pas bla ma la thos nas //
T02D3441:100a-12: bcom ldan rtag tu bsgom pa la sogs rnam par bya //
T02D3441:100a-13: dang po yid la mngon 'dod dri med dben pa'i phyogs //
T02D3441:100a-14: dri bzangs me tog la sogs rnam pa mang po dang //
T02D3441:100a-15: chom po dgra dang 'tshe ba la sogs rnam spangs par //
T02D3441:100a-16: bya ba kun zin gzhan yang bde bar rab tu 'dug / g-yo ba'i sems ni 'bad pa yis //
T02D3441:100a-17: rtse gcig tu ni nges par bya //
T02D3441:100a-18: gzhan don byed pa'i bsam pa yis //
T02D3441:100a-19: bsgom bya de yis rjes su ni //
T02D3441:100a-20: byams pas sems can rnams la lus gcig la skyes mtshungs shing gnyen gyi mtshan nyid ldan //
T02D3441:100a-21: snying rjes sdug bsngal las kyang sdug bsngal rgyur gyur 'gro rnams mngon par 'don par spro //
T02D3441:100a-22: dga' ba'i sems kyi khyad 'phags mtshan nyid ldan pa'i yang dag dga' ba mtha' yas pa //
T02D3441:100a-23: btang snyoms log par mngon zhen zad pa'i rang bzhin dang bcas mkhas pas bsgom par bya //
T02D3441:100a-24: de yis rjes su ji srid yid kyis 'dod pa rab brkyang byas //
T02D3441:100a-25: dri med 'od 'phro bsil zer byed pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3441:100b-0: dkar po'i mdog / de'i steng shin tu @100b gzhon
T02D3441:100b-1: zhing dri med gser gyi kha dog can //
T02D3441:100b-2: chu skyes 'dab ma dri med 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom par bya //
T02D3441:100b-3: zla ba chu skyes dag gi 'od zer rnam par
T02D3441:100b-4: brkyang zhing rnam par g-yo ba'i mchog / steng du
T02D3441:100b-5: 'phen 'gyur 'od zer rang bzhin phug na gser mdog
T02D3441:100b-7: sngon ma dag gis g-yogs bzhin 'gro ba rnams la phan phyir sngags pas ring du bsgom //
T02D3441:100b-8: shin tu mchog gyur 'jam pa'i rdo rje go 'phang mngon 'dod mi mchog rnams kyis so //
T02D3441:100b-9: phyi nas skye dang rga dang mi mthun smod dang lkugs sogs sdug bsngal 'khrugs rnams la //
T02D3441:100b-10: zla ba chu skyes zung la mam gyi yi ge las byung 'od kyis 'khrigs bya ste //
T02D3441:100b-11: khams gsum blta zhing bltas pas bde ba'i mchog rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas dang mtshungs pa //
T02D3441:100b-12: bdag gis legs byas 'dir yang yid ni yongs rdzogs bdag nyid rnam par blta bar bya //
T02D3441:100b-13: phyi nas phyogs bcu rnams su bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang ni de bzhin gshegs rnams dang //
T02D3441:100b-14: de bzhin dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' sku rnams thams cad 'od kyis gdan drangs te //
T02D3441:100b-15: de rnams mdun byas yid kyi shing rta'i rang bzhin las skyes mchod pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D3441:100b-16: sna tshogs me tog dri bzangs bdug spos sna tshogs rnams kyis yang dag mchod byas te //
T02D3441:100b-17: de rnams mdun du dang por yang ni sdig pa bshags pa la sogs rnams byas nas //
T02D3441:100b-18: de nas de las de bzhin 'od zer rnams kyis ba spu'i khung zhugs gcig tu son //
T02D3441:100b-19: tshogs pa'i rnam pa de yis rab zhugs snying gar blta zhing de nas de byung ba'i //
T02D3441:100b-20: rmongs pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms mkhas khyab bdag 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D3441:100b-21: dri med bcu drug lo lon ltar mdzes seng ge sngon po'i steng du bzhugs mdzad cing //
T02D3441:100b-22: phyag gi padma zung dag bshad pa'i tshul du rnam 'khrigs zhabs g-yon skyil krung phyed //
T02D3441:100b-23: tshogs la brten las mtshungs med shin tu mdzes shing shin tu ring min thung ngu'ang min //
T02D3441:100b-24: rin chen gser dang nor bu'i rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyi phreng bas kun nas brgyan //
T02D3441:100b-25: bden pa ma yin rdzun pa'ang min pa'i me long mthil du gzugs brnyan lta bur gsal gyur pa //
T02D3441:101a-0: 'gro ba kun la yongs su skyabs sbyin smra ba'i mgon po dpa' bo gzhon nu @101a * //
T02D3441:101a-2: phyi nas bdag nyid de bzhin sdig pa rnams ni
T02D3441:101a-3: rnam par byang gyur 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i skur gyur
T02D3441:101a-4: pa // mkhas pas ji srid bcom ldan sku dang
T02D3441:101a-5: mtshungs par ma gyur bar du ring du yang ni
T02D3441:101a-6: pa // bsgom par bya // bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas te //
T02D3441:101a-7: ta mtha' ra mtha' sa mtha' dang //
T02D3441:101a-8: de bzhin gsal byed rim pa'i tshogs //
T02D3441:101a-9: ai yig dang ni sna ldan bcas //
T02D3441:101a-10: 'di yi khyad par gzhan rnams ni //
T02D3441:101a-11: bla ma dam pa'i gsung bzhin du //
T02D3441:101a-12: dri med rnam dag rab tu gzung bya blo ldan mkhas pa yis //
T02D3441:101a-13: rab mchog bla ma'i bka' yis bsam gtan sngags kyi bya ba bya //
T02D3441:101a-14: khyad par kun nas gsungs pa mtha' dag bdag gis shes mi nus //
T02D3441:101a-15: gal te yid kyis kyang ni 'jam dpal shin tu ngo mtshar zhing //
T02D3441:101a-16: yang dag sgrub byed bcom ldan rtag tu 'dzin byed gyur pa yis //
T02D3441:101a-17: dngos grub bla ma dam pa'i gsung las blo gros dang ldan zhing //
T02D3441:101a-18: de bzhin du yang mi shes mun pa'i tshogs rnams nges 'joms 'gyur ;
T02D3441:101a-19: / yang dag bla ma'i bka' drin gyis ni blo gros dman pa bdag gis 'jam pa'i dpal //
T02D3441:101a-20: gzhon nu'i sgrub thabs 'di byas dpag med bsod nams tshogs ni gang zhig bsags gyur pa //
T02D3441:101a-21: de yis 'dir ni mi dge spangs shing dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpe med pa //
T02D3441:101a-22: dpal dang yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsam ljon pa
T02D3441:101a-23: lta bur 'gro kun thob gyur cig / dpal ldan
T02D3441:101a-24: ngag gi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs pandi ta dpal ldan
